flocksimulator.util

Class BinLattice<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • flocksimulator.util.BinLattice<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RandomAccess

    public class BinLattice<T>
extends Object
implements RandomAccess
    Bin-Lattice spatial subdivision data structure described in this paper: https://www.red3d.com/cwr/papers/2000/pip.pdf implemented for 2D neighbor- queries.
    Author:
    peje

      • insert

        public void insert(int posX,
                   int posY,
                   T element)
        Add an element to a cell in the grid according to its position
        Parameters:
        posX - actual x position in simulation
        posY - actual y position in simulation
        element - to add to cell in grid

      • getNearestNeighbors

        public FlockList<T> getNearestNeighbors(int posX,
                                        int posY)
        Query neighbors for specified position. The method gets the bin according to the specified position. Adds the neighbors from the specified cell and its eight neighboring cells to a list
        Parameters:
        posX - actual x position in simulation
        posY - actual y position in simulation
        Returns:
        list of neighbors
